title: Vending machines : sales volume of vended products 2010
summary: In general Vended volume (in billion U.S. dollars) has rose over the Year.
Vended volume (in billion U.S. dollars) is gradually increasing from 2000 to 2001, roughly constant from 2001 to 2002, and finally slightly increasing from 2002 to 2003.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2000 and 2001.
The highest Vended volume (in billion U.S. dollars), of value 42.2 was reached at Year 2003
The lowest Vended volume (in billion U.S. dollars), of value 38.7 was reported at Year 2000
